content:
I think I'll start by setting a goal to journal 3 times a week, and I'll try to dedicate 15-20 minutes each time to writing. I'll start with stream-of-consciousness writing and see how it goes. I'll also try to explore different formats and prompts to keep things interesting. Thanks for the tips and guidance!

Now, I think I'll go ahead and start my journaling journey. I'll make sure to be patient and kind to myself throughout the process.
